resources.string: Utility Pad
Copy any TEXT, URL Or EMOJI within your device and it will show up in Utility Pad MAIN! (THIS IS ONLY APPLICABLE FOR DEVICES USING ANDROID 9 OR BELOW)
1. **LONG PRESS AND DRAG** the floating button on the bottom of the screen to change its position
2. Long Press on added items to use Multi-Select
3. You can also add another floating action button for adding Reminders , by going into Settings
4. Long press on the numbers/Actions buttons/backgrounds of the items and drag to change their position in the list
5. You can play around with a number of Fonts, text Sizes and Themes by going into Settings
1. Translation models need to be downloaded for each different language, if you are translating from or to a particular language for the FIRST TIME
2. Translation models have near about 30MB of size, so while translating from or to a particular language for the FIRST TIME, please use *Wifi*
3. Once a translation model has been downloaded, it does not need to be downloaded again and you can translate offline as well, thereafter
If you are using or translating to a particular language for the FIRST TIME then please be connected to a *Wifi* It may take a few moments to download the particular Translation Model the FIRST TIME
Model couldnâ€™t be downloaded. Please check your network connection
Show or Hide Floating Action Button for adding Reminders
Open navigation drawer
Close navigation drawer
Loading Translation Model, Please wait.... If this is your FIRST TIME translating to or from this particular language then please make sure that you are connected to the internet.

Your Device does not have auto start option for the app for when your device is switched off/restarted, so please REMEMBER TO RESTART THE APP IMMEDIATELY, IF YOUR DEVICE IS REBOOTED/RESTARTED, OTHERWISE THE REMINDERS WILL NOT BE RESTARTED.
Your device is using an Android Version above 9. The app may not be able to save clipboard history of your device.
Saving clipboard history, setting Reminders, Translating, Searching, Dialling and Sharing texts directly! And also notification and app shortcuts to help you work more efficiently
